description:
effective_go: a little more about comma ok and type assertion
Fixes issue 2416.

messages.text: LGTM http://codereview.appspot.com/5370049/diff/1/doc/effective_go.tmpl File doc/effective_go.tmpl (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/5370049/diff/1/doc/effective_go.tmpl#newcode2665 doc/effective_go.tmpl:2665: If the type assertion fails, ok will be false, safely, and e Not sure it's add anything to say "safely" here; perhaps remove it. http://codereview.appspot.com/5370049/diff/1/doc/effective_go.tmpl#newcode2667 doc/effective_go.tmpl:2667: If it succeeds, however, ok will be true, which means the s/, however// http://codereview.appspot.com/5370049/diff/1/doc/effective_go.tmpl#newcode2669 doc/effective_go.tmpl:2669: which we can decompose for more information about the error. Perhaps s/decompose/examine/
